author: Nintendo of America
description:
SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance is out now on Nintendo Switch: https://ninten.do/6052seBhk 
 
Vengeance begins. Experience deep ninja action with thrilling combat against fierce enemies in a unique stylized world. 
  
In SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance, you'll play as the legendary Shinobi Joe Musashi and discover your village burned to the ground and your clan turned to stone. Set off on a quest for vengeance, ready to face an unparalleled evil to avenge your clan.  
 
#NintendoSwitch #SHINOBIArtofVengeance
title: SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
FORSAKEN 64 is coming to the Nintendo 64 – Nintendo Classics: Mature app on Sept 4 for Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack members!

You are a ruthless mercenary, sent to the condemned remains of Earth as part of a covert operation codenamed "Forsaken." Your mission is to infiltrate and destroy the last bastions of the mechanized terror that wiped out all life on the planet. Earth is a death trap riddled with merciless mechanoid adversaries and gangs of rival bounty hunters, and you'll have to brave them all astride your anti-grav pioncycle to make your fortune...or meet your doom. Choose between different modes in this first-person shooter title released for the Nintendo 64™ system in 1998, and enter the fight in Single Player Mode or Multi-Player Mode. Then, select your bike. Each bike has different attributes, each biker a different attitude. Pick one that suits your style, then dive into your mission. The availability of weapons, enemies, and powerups changes depending on the
title: FORSAKEN® 64 – Nintendo 64 – Nintendo Classics: MATURE 17+
